examples.name: Basic Query
examples.description: Simple user message without system prompt

messages.content: You are a professional banking assistant. Be concise and helpful.
What are your interest rates for personal loans?

examples.name: Credit Card Blocking
examples.description: Request to block credit card with phone number

messages.content: I lost my credit card, please block it immediately [phone: +1234567890]
You are a helpful banking assistant.
What types of loans do you offer?
We offer three main types of loans: personal loans, home loans, and auto loans. Each has different terms and interest rates.
What are the requirements for a personal loan?
What are the key financial metrics mentioned in the Q3 report?

examples.name: Complex Query with Context
examples.description: Query with system prompt, conversation history, and phone number

messages.content: You are a professional banking call center agent. Always verify customer identity before sensitive operations.
Hi, I need help with my account
Hello! I'd be happy to help you with your account. What do you need assistance with today?
I think my card was stolen. Can you block it? My number is [phone: +1234567891]

examples.name: Vapi.ai Style Request
examples.description: Typical request from Vapi.ai voice assistant

messages.content: You are a professional banking call center agent for FinTalk. Speak naturally and conversationally. Always be polite and helpful.
Hello, I'm interested in getting a home loan. What do I need to qualify?

curl_examples.basic_streaming: curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/chat/completions/ -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"messages": [{"role": "user", "content": "What loan options are available?"}], "stream": true}'
curl_examples.basic_non_streaming: curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/chat/completions/ -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"messages": [{"role": "user", "content": "What loan options are available?"}], "stream": false}'
curl_examples.with_system_prompt: curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/chat/completions/ -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"messages": [{"role": "system", "content": "You are a helpful assistant."}, {"role": "user", "content": "What are your services?"}], "temperature": 0.7, "stream": false}'
curl_examples.credit_card_block: curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/chat/completions/ -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"messages": [{"role": "user", "content": "Block my card [phone: +1234567890]"}], "stream": false}'
